title: Team looking to recruit people
body:
Hello dear members of oceanic server,

My friend and I are recruiting Plat 3+ players, who are above the age of 18, to create a team. 
Our goal is to get to challenger by the end of this season and start playing in competitions  next year.
By working as a team, we are planning to improve as players and bring forward the maximum potential within us as players.

My account: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=ihateriven (Plat 1)
My friends account: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=moonlightshadows (Diamond 5)

My most comfortable picks: Riven, Hecarim, Braum
My friend's most comfortable picks: Jinx, Master Yi, Soraka

We are looking for;
- A Mid Main,
- A Jungle Main
- A support Main

Please feel free to add me as a friend  so we can talk about it more in detail.
